column4: hello, im on BREEZY, can i install linux-image-2.6.15-23-386_2.6.15-23.39_i386.deb  without borking my system?  if so, how
Add that as a repository for apt-get
how can i add just the kernel directory for that repository?
Hmmm. You may be able to use the /etc/apt/preferences file to do that, but that is a little deep for me
